root.name: Chaser
root.description: Chaser is one of a number of PC games that uses a bullet time mechanic in the gameplay to give the player an advantage against enemies.CHASER follows the adventures of an amnesiac soldier/gun for hire as he's hunted by corporations and the mafia. The game takes place in the future, as Chaser fights through spaceships, city streets, backalleys, warehouses, sunken structures and to Mars. The levels are all designed linearly, and feature little to no variation in what they offer. The goal is simply to shoot as many people as you can and make your way to the door that will take you to the next level. The game features impressive graphics and cutscenes for it's time.
